title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Get clear answers to your questions, so you can focus on what matters—acing your interviews with confidence.

All.question: How does the platform work?
All.answer: Our platform allows users to practice interview scenarios in real time with AI or a friend, providing feedback and insights after each session.

All.question: What pricing plans do you offer?
All.answer: We offer three pricing plans: Free, Standard, and Pro, each with different features suited for various needs.

All.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
All.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings without any cancellation fees.

Platform.question: Is the platform suitable for all job roles?
Platform.answer: Yes, our platform is designed to cater to a wide range of job roles, with customizable questions based on the user's preferences.

Platform.question: Can I practice with a friend?
Platform.answer: Absolutely! You can use the 'Practice with a Friend' mode to simulate real interview scenarios with constructive feedback.

Platform.question: What technology is used on the platform?
Platform.answer: We use cutting-edge AI and natural language processing (NLP) to generate feedback and simulate interview scenarios.

Pricing.question: What are the available pricing plans?
Pricing.answer: We offer three plans: Free (limited access), Standard (full platform access), and Pro (full access with additional premium features).

Pricing.question: Do you offer discounts for long-term subscriptions?
Pricing.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for annual subscriptions as well as occasional promotions.

Pricing.question: Is there a free trial available?
Pricing.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for the Standard and Pro plans so you can explore all features.

Subscription.question: How do I upgrade my subscription?
Subscription.answer: You can upgrade your subscription anytime from your account settings. The new plan will be applied immediately.

Subscription.question: What happens if I miss a payment?
Subscription.answer: If you miss a payment, your subscription will be paused until the payment is resolved. You won’t lose your data during this time.

Subscription.question: Can I switch between plans?
Subscription.answer: Yes, you can switch between plans at any time. The changes will take effect immediately, and you will be billed accordingly.
